result.execSummary:
The defendant Gilberto Acevedo Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Due to not following the payment plan agreement, specifically payment(s) were missed, the payment plan has been ended and the failure to pay action has been enforced.
Assessment for Attorney Fees in the amount of $1050.00  entered as ordered by the court on 01/11/2017  to pay $50.00 monthly.  Final payment due by 01/16/2018. Failure to pay is a Civil Judgment.
Affidavit and order for payment of attorney fees and costs signed.  Filed by Attorney Ramon Valdez  $1050.00
Signed and Filed:  Affidavit and Order for payment of Attorney Fees and Costs

Defendant Gilberto Acevedo in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  May Y. Lee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
On the motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended to Retail Theft pursuant to s. 63.042 Wis. Stats. to which Defendant plead no contest. Court finds defendant guilty of amended charge.  Court orders a forfeiture in the amount of $150 including costs to be paid by 01-30-2017 or Civil Judgment.
to Bar Testimonial Statements by Persons Not Present at Trial and Statements of Non-Charged Co-Defendant, received and filed

Defendant Gilberto Acevedo in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Court cancels stayed bench warrant.  

Amended complaint previously filed.  On motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended to Theft (value not to exceed $2,500) - PTAC, As a Party to a Crime, contrary to Wisconsin Statutes section(s) 943.20(1)(a) and (3)(a), 939.05, a Class A Misdemeanor.  

Defense requests a motion hearing date.  Defense to file any motions by 10-21-2016, State's response to be filed by 11-04-2016.  Case adjourned to Branch 31.  Motion hearing scheduled for December 1, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
State's Notice of Motion and Motion to Adjourn, received and filed.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
State's Witness List, Motion in Limine and Requested Jury Instructions, received and filed.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.

Attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez in court.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Case calendared for final pretrial conference.  Defense counsel requests stayed bench warrant and that the jury trial date be converted to a status conference date.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until 9/26/16 at 8:30 am for status conference in Branch 31.  Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Gilberto Acevedo in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense requested a final pretrial and jury trial date in Branch 4.  All parties are notified that effective August 1, 2016 this case will be assigned to Judge Hannah Dugan - Branch 31 in Room 622 - Courthouse.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 14, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 26, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Gilberto Acevedo in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court grants defense request for more time to obtain information.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 4.  Status conference scheduled for June 24, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Gilberto Acevedo in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court grants defense request so that he can investigate further.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 4.  Status conference scheduled for June 1, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Gilberto Acevedo in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense counsel has received discovery and an offer.  Court grants defense motion for an adjournment of the pretrial conference.  Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 4.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 27, 2016 at 08:30 am.
- signed and filed.

Defendant Gilberto Acevedo in court.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  The defendant is not eligible for Public Defender representation.  Court questioned the defendant as to his income/monthly expenses.  Court will appoint counsel at the expense of the County.  Court appoints attorney Ramon Valdez.  Court orders the defendant to repay the County at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing April 15, 2016.  Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 4.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 7, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Oral No Contact Order with": Joseph A.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Siefert, Branch 47
Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to  ReserveJudge, Br. 21

Defendant Gilberto Acevedo in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Defendant Gilberto Acevedo in custody.  
William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: sm  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  
  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. 
Defendant entered a plea of not guilty.  
DEFENDANT DOES  NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER  REPRESENTATION.  

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  
Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 21, 2016 at 01:30 pm., Reserve Judge, Branch 21
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Gilberto Acevedo not in court.  Karen A. Loebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is a possible victim identified, therefore, Court stays order of forfeiture with recompense to be determined at close of case.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 4/3/15 @ 1:30 pm
